name: Ostfriesland Games
description:
An obvious send-up of California Games, this is another humorous collection of competitive sporting events with a certain "local" character - this time set in Ostfriesland, Germany, where the collective taste in sports is apparently rather quaint. Popular regional games include cow milking (in which other cow products may be tossed into your opponent's bucket), shooting pigs (out of the sky), bike riding (with square wheels), teabag throwing, and (for that adrenaline-pumping extreme sports kick) competitive roof-building.

The above events blend playing against the clock, against the computer, and against another human player; you may practice each one individually or, if particularly lacking in self-respect, play the full set in a row. As with Blood 'n Guts, be ready for a lot of joystick waggling.

shot.caption: Some curious events to compete in
When pigs fly (...we'll just need to aim more carefully.)
Does that meter measure square miles, then?
Cast thy teabag upon the winds
Roof-building: when snail-racing gets too exciting
Unsure if happy, or having a mild stroke
